metadata.name: Duro
metadata.description:
"El camino será duro
no podrás ver nada
llevaremos la cara tapada."


First collection in collaboration with Najwa Nimri & N4rf.

Capsules of a broken future, with no place to go,
the screen is not an encryptable shelter.

In these four pieces modeled by N4rf, Najwa wanders through scenes of a portable and dystopian micro-landscape — dystopian, because the render dismantles the classic coordinates of visual representation and because the NFT is a new stage of reflection in the computer maelstrom . In her verses Najwa does not give in to the hope of the linear, she persists as a digital Venus resigned not to emerge from cybernetic flows. 

T_T
